metadata.name: Nouns Wooden Chessboard #1
metadata.description:
Nouns themed wooden chess board crafted in high-quality wood,  inspired by minimalist lines.

All made of solid wood, the game consists of a box, where the pieces are stored inside, protected by cork. The lid becomes a board, and can be placed directly on the table or fitted on top of the box.

Each piece is handmade, seeking the best finish in the smallest details.

The first owner of the NFT will receive the physical Nouns Chessboard #1.  
Free shipping worldwide.

This was made possible thanks to [Nouns Prop House Round 5](https://prop.house/nouns/round-5/494)

It took more than 2 months to build, check the [process on this twitter thread](https://twitter.com/MafriendsArt/status/1544811091972313096)

**Woods used:**  
Jatoba and Purple Heart.  
**Dimensions:**  
Box: 36 x 36 x 7 cm  
Chess pieces:  
King: 2.5 x 2.5 x 9 cm  
Queen: 2.5 x 2.5 x 10 cm  
Bishop: 2.5 x 2.5 x 8 cm  
Knight: 2.5 x 2.5 x 7 cm  
Rook: 2.5 x 2.5 x 7 cm  
**Finishing:**  
Mineral oil and wax.

Artist: Peltogyne  

Designed with ❤️ and a little help from [Mafriends](https://twitter.com/mafriendsart)
What are you going to play against E4?
